an10.144:1.1: “I will teach you the principle that results in suffering and that which results in happiness. …
an10.144:1.3: And what principle results in suffering?
an10.144:1.4: Wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong immersion, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
an10.144:1.5: This is called the principle that results in suffering.
an10.144:1.6: And what principle results in happiness?
an10.144:1.7: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
an10.144:1.8: This is called the principle that results in happiness.”
